title: Ground News - Zelensky responded to Pope Francis: 'We will never raise any other flag than the country's blue and yellow colors.'
text: Zelensky responded to Pope Francis: 'We will never raise any other flag than the country's blue and yellow colors.' Volodimir Zelensky and Ukrainian Foreign Minister Dmitro Kuleba also reacted to Summary by Blikk.hu Pope Francis ' Saturday statement, in which the head of the church said it is courageous to display a white flag. 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right [] Blikk.hu Zelensky responded to Pope Francis: 'We will never raise any other flag than the country's blue and yellow colors.'
